  • ⿱ Above to below

    • 區 [ qū ] area, district, region, ward; surname
①女子梳妝用的鏡匣，泛指精巧的小匣子：妝奩(嫁資)。印奩。奩資(女子出嫁時，從孃家帶到婆家的財物)。

Liushutong characters (5)

奩字的基本解释

奩
lián
见“奁”。

奩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
同“匳1”。“奁1”的繁体字。
(1)古代盛梳妆用品的器具。
(2)泛指盒匣一类的盛物器具。
(3)古时盛放香炉的笼子。
(4)指陪嫁的衣物等。

奩字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奩； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页253第22
【唐韻】【正韻】力鹽切【集韻】【韻會】離鹽切，?音簾。藏香之器。一曰鏡匣。【後漢·皇后紀】帝視太后鏡奩中物。今俗以嫁女之具曰妝奩。　【說文】作籢。通作匳。別作匲??。

奁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Same as "匳1". "奁1" in traditional characters.
(1) Ancient appliances used to hold toiletry products.
(2) Broadly refers to containers such as boxes.
(3) Cages for holding incense burners in ancient times.
(4) Refers to dowry clothing, etc.
奁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Da Zi Department] 　奁; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 253 22
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Cut the salt with strength [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Cut from the salt, the sound curtain. Tibetan incense tool. One said the mirror box. [Later Han·Queens] The emperor regarded the Queen Mother in the mirror. Nowadays, the custom of marrying a daughter is called makeup.　【Said the text】For the sake of writing. Pass for 匳. Don't make trouble.
